notes: Summary: Brewster makes an accidental painting by stepping in paints, but his real painting is more sophisticated.

156.heading: Buford, Mark--Articles About.
156.title: "Meatloaf Night, with Brewster"
156.author: by Mark Buford
notes: Buford writes about his career, illustrated with a photograph of the artist, a cast of characters and samples of the strip. Although the strip is titled "Meatloaf Nights" in some newspapers, it is consistently "Meatloaf Night" in this article.
